Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_n936l3dUfp1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1jStxsu"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/c67d75fab86e2fc8f4e7747433007287/tumblr_inline_n936lbUqCm1rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p>Are you the kind of person that ignores “Moar Boosters” and opts for “Moar Parachutes” instead? Vendan’s <a href="http://bit.ly/1jStxsu"><strong>DEBREFUND</strong></a> is the plugin for you. Get back some cold, hard funds for all of the dropped stages you land with parachutes.</p>

<p>Read more about DebRefund <a href="http://bit.ly/1jStxsu"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>
That's a great mod. Good choice for the modding Mondays SQUAD!
How about some bigger chutes so that i don't need that many moar? (i mean in stock game)
Definitely belongs to the most useful mos in KSP 0.24 that I use ... finally no problems anymore with getting money from detached stages that vanish out of your 2.5 km range

Agreed. I've used this since Day 1, and it works flawlessly. Seriously. I have put over 10 hours into it (Actually not that much ): ) with a combination of it and ~20 other mods, and it works perfect, regardless of the parts.
This should have been in the stock 0.24, in fact I can't play without it, otherwise it feels cheap
Great mod, good jop, keep on rocking
